content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Copper plate mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)
-  Furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position (42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace at position (45.0, -80.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found related to copper cable factory

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before starting the mining operation
- Make sure the burner mining drill is placed near the resource to be mined

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the operation
- Make sure the furnace result is not full before starting the operation

### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure the boiler has fuel before starting the operation
- Make sure the boiler is connected to a steam engine

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine has input liquid before starting the operation
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a boiler

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is placed near a water source
- Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group

### Errors when using pipe group
- Ensure the pipe group is connected to a fluid source and a fluid destination
- Make sure the pipe group is not empty before using it

### Errors when using electricity group
- Ensure the electricity group is connected to a power source
- Make sure the electricity group is not empty before using it

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has fuel before starting the operation
- Make sure the burner inserter is placed near a source and a destination chest

### Errors when using lab
- Ensure the lab has the required input before starting the research operation
- Make sure the lab is not already researching something before starting a new research operation
